citation_details.title: Precise cortical contributions to sensorimotor feedback control during reactive balance
citation_details.author: S Boebinger, A Payne, G Martino, K Kerr
citation_details.abstract: The role of the cortex in shaping automatic whole-body motor behaviors such as walking and  balance is poorly understood. Gait and balance are typically mediated through subcortical
citation_details.short_author: S Boebinger, A Payne, G Martino, K Kerr
citation_details.publisher: Public Library of Science San Francisco, CA USA
